item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】FLAC - Ace Of Base - Beautiful Life era (All Singles)
item.description:
These are taken from 'Beautiful Life - The Singles'. This part contains all the Beautiful Life Era. I have also included mixes that were released previously but were not included in this set.

Lucky Love
  1. Lucky Love
  2. Lucky Love Acoustic Version
  3. Lucky Love Raggasol Version
  4. Lucky Love Extended Version
  5. Lucky Love Amadin Remix
  6. Lucky Love Frankie Knuckles 7" Edit
  7. Lucky Love Frankie Knuckles Classic Club Mix
  8. Lucky Love Frankie Knuckles Classic Instrumental
  9. Lucky Love Vision Lorimer 7" Edit
  10. Lucky Love Vision Lorimer Funkdified Mix
  11. Lucky Love Lenny B's Edit
  12. Lucky Love Lenny B's Club Mix
  13. Lucky Love Lenny B's Full Of Love Club Mix
  14. Lucky Love Armand Van Helden's Brittish Nites Remix
  15. Lucky Love Todd Terry Mix
  16. Lucky Love Franktified Dub Mix
